findings.title: When creating a new trading pair contract, using the wrong feeRateAmount will result in high transaction fees.
findings.description: Anyone can create a new trading pair contract and set an excessively high handling fee, making the transaction expensive.

findings.title: No Processing for Deprecated Fee Block
findings.description: There is currently no processing for the deprecated fee block.

findings.title: Transaction pair fee setting problem
findings.description: Anyone can create a new trading pair contract and set an excessively high handling fee, making the transaction expensive.

findings.title: Code logic flaws cause overflow
findings.description: The enableFeeAmount function does not handle overflow properly, which can lead to incorrect handling fee status.
